test-step.description: And I edit company with name Test company

And I input company detail as below | companyFullName | workType | listed | headOffice | customerCode | branches | website | | Test company | 土木 | Type One | 岩手県 | z999 | 静岡県, 岡山県 | anlh2207@gmail.com |
And In Company Detail screen, I click 'Save' button
Then The system should save company success
